name: The disappearance of Springcreek
description:
The quiet town of Springcreek was once a quaint retirement village.. that was until the military came to town. The folks complained and protested but the military moved right on in regardless. The folks calmed down over time but before long, the quarry was flooded. The new lake became a popular spot for fishing and recreation. That was before she rose up from below. Within 24 hours, Springcreek was empty. No one, no folks, no militants, no nothing. Nobody.

This is where you come in, Grab a flashlight, search for the clues around the town, find out whatever you can.. this extends way beyond the norms of reality..

Good luck.
